text: in this video we'll take you through
inviting team members while sharing your
workbooks and apps
sharing is essential in honeycomb adding
team members lets you collaborate on the
workbook when building
then when ready share the app for use by
your wider team
in addition your team members are
automatically added to your contacts
within honeycode
since honeycode is a team app builder
contacts are especially useful for
personalizing app views
and sending email and in-app
notifications
let's first look at sharing within
mydrive
in mydrive you see all workbooks and
associated apps that you either own
or collaborate on with your team here
you can share either an
entire workbook and all associated apps
or simply a single app we'll do that now
click the share button that displays to
the right of the app name
the modal shows the asset to be shared
as you type a name or email address
members of your team will auto populate
and you can select that team member
type the full team member type the full
email of someone not yet on your team
and you can share while at the same time
invite them to join your team
click invite and a pop-up in the bottom
left notes that the invites have been
sent
in tables you access the same invite and
share capabilities by selecting the
share workbook button
when in builder you have the choice to
share just the app
or click the pull down to share the
workbook and all apps
when viewing an app on your web browser
the share app button is available in the
upper right corner of the screen
sharing here can only be done with
current team members
that's it once you click the update
button an email is sent
if a current team member they are
notified of the new app
if inviting a new team member they're
invited to create a honeycomb account
and once in their my drive they have
access to the workbook or app that was
shared
thanks for watching
